Text: Hey stingsteel I didn't know they had something for this pain in the ass problem we all..get in windows, and I think everyone should get this for real!!.. I personally know how to fix that error problem easily but this takes me right to the problem without having to look or guessing what app is causing the problem as a matter of fact! Windows should include this in there OS LoL I'm deadass  this is a good and cute lil addon for windows I say.. it reminds me of PicaView because of the easiness and helpfullness thanks alot stingsteel I also say to those smart programmers GET THIS NOW!  haha  Later....
